title: Stomach Pain After Eating Leftover Rice
description: A patient reports abdominal pain following the consumption of leftover rice.
environmental_context: Patient lives in a humid area with frequent food spoilage.

title: Early Pregnancy Symptoms
description: A young woman reports missed period and fatigue, unaware of possible pregnancy.
environmental_context: Limited access to pregnancy testing in the area.

title: Chronic Sinus Issues with Facial Pain and Snoring
description: Middle-aged patient with persistent sinus-related symptoms such as facial pain, nasal congestion, postnasal drip, and snoring. Symptoms have lasted over two weeks.
environmental_context: Patient is a smoker with family history of allergies. Reports worsened symptoms in the morning and evening. Imaging confirmed bilateral maxillary sinus thickening.

title: Paranoid Schizophrenia with Medication Noncompliance
description: 30-year-old male with chronic paranoid schizophrenia presents with increasing paranoia and agitation following a lapse in medication compliance.
environmental_context: Patient was recently discharged from jail following a psychotic episode and is currently under involuntary hold. No substance use history, but demonstrates poor insight into illness and need for care.

title: Routine Physical Exam
description: A patient undergoes a routine physical exam, with normal findings across multiple systems.
environmental_context: A well-equipped hospital with access to necessary medical tools for physical exams.
